creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
description: From a suite of four etchings, each depicting a metaphorical clockface design.
inscription: Signed, Dated, Numbered, Titled, Inscribed, and Chop Mark
medium: Etching and drypoint with plate tone in blue ink
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1983.
signed:
LL: [PHILIP LARSON 1978]
LL: [A.P. 1/9]
LL: [SECOND STENCIL]
LC: [SULLIVAN AND WRIGHT / CHICAGO]
LL: [VEL Chop Mark]
title: Second Stencil (Sullivan & Wright)
